turkish_example_sentence: Sen pahalı İtalyan restoranında akşam yemeği istememiş olsaydın, bütçeni aşmazdın
english_example_sentence: If you had not wanted dinner at the expensive Italian restaurant, you would not have exceeded your budget
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не хотел ужин в дорогом итальянском ресторане, ты бы не превысил свой бюджет
